Package com.ikanow.aleph2.data_model.interfaces.data_analytics

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IAnalyticsAccessContext<T>
    Concrete implementations of this generic context can be requested from the data services using getUnderlyingTechnology (with the AnalyticJobInputBean passed into the options as JSON using BeanTemplateUtils.toJson(input_job).toString()) eg "interface HadoopInputContext extends IAnalyticsAccessContext" and then the analytic technology can use the returned type in a technology specific way to help with the input NOTE: use the AnalyticsUtils methods to inject implementation from within the data services
    IAnalyticsAccessContext.GenericCrudAccessContext
    A common access context that the AccessContext will (generally) satisfy
    IAnalyticsContext
    A context library that is always passed to the IAnalyticsTechnology module and can also be passed to the analytics library processing
    IAnalyticsTechnologyModule
    Defines the interface of a module capable of performing batch or streaming processing via internal or external functions
    IAnalyticsTechnologyService
    An IAnalyticsTechnologyModule that can be passed around like a service within the system Analytics Technologies that can be used for Streaming or Batch enrichment must implement this instead of the module version It does not currently have any other users
    IBatchRecord
    The basic object type corresponding to batch processing (analytics and enrichment)
